org.svvrl.goal.gui.UIDialog
org.svvrl.goal.gui.pref.OptionsDialog<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of the properties object
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
Direct Known Subclasses:
CustomConversionDialog, GameConversionDialog
public class OptionsDialog<T extends Properties>
extends UIDialog
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
This is a dialog containing a component for adjusting options. The component can be an OptionsPanel or a Component. If the component is an OptionsPanel, this dialog will provide three buttons, namely OK, Save, and Cancel. Otherwise, only OK and Cancel will be provided. The Save button allows the user to save the adjusted options as the user preference.
Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai
See Also:

    • OptionsDialog

      public OptionsDialog​(Window win, java.awt.Component c)
      Constructs this dialog with an owner window and a component to be displayed in this dialog. Since there is no OptionsPanel provided, the method getOptions() always returns null.
      Parameters:
      win - the owner window of this dialog
      c - a component to be displayed in this dialog
